message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $11,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $11,500 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $10,000?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of this, I am willing to consider $10,500 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise while still allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  $10,250 is the best I can do.
I understand your position, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to agree on a price of $10,400 for the product. This allows us to both reach a satisfactory agreement.
